options.content:
# Schema Objects Comparison Dashboard
Compare stored procedures, views, and triggers between two environments ‚Äî detect drift in definitions, missing objects, and extra objects

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) as objects FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote})

SELECT count(*) as objects FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote})

WITH env1_objs AS (SELECT object_type, object_name, definition_hash FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote})), env2_objs AS (SELECT object_type, object_name, definition_hash FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote})) SELECT count(*) as differences FROM (SELECT e1.object_name FROM env1_objs e1 LEFT JOIN env2_objs e2 ON e1.object_type = e2.object_type AND e1.object_name = e2.object_name WHERE e2.object_name = '' UNION ALL SELECT e2.object_name FROM env2_objs e2 LEFT JOIN env1_objs e1 ON e2.object_type = e1.object_type AND e2.object_name = e1.object_name WHERE e1.object_name = '' UNION ALL SELECT e1.object_name FROM env1_objs e1 JOIN env2_objs e2 ON e1.object_type = e2.object_type AND e1.object_name = e2.object_name WHERE e1.definition_hash != e2.definition_hash) diffs

SELECT countIf(environment = ${env1:singlequote}) as "${env1}", countIf(environment = ${env2:singlequote}) as "${env2}" FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND object_type = 'PROCEDURE' AND environment IN (${env1:singlequote}, ${env2:singlequote}) AND scan_time IN (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment IN (${env1:singlequote}, ${env2:singlequote}) GROUP BY environment)

SELECT countIf(environment = ${env1:singlequote}) as "${env1}", countIf(environment = ${env2:singlequote}) as "${env2}" FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND object_type = 'VIEW' AND environment IN (${env1:singlequote}, ${env2:singlequote}) AND scan_time IN (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment IN (${env1:singlequote}, ${env2:singlequote}) GROUP BY environment)

SELECT countIf(environment = ${env1:singlequote}) as "${env1}", countIf(environment = ${env2:singlequote}) as "${env2}" FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND object_type = 'TRIGGER' AND environment IN (${env1:singlequote}, ${env2:singlequote}) AND scan_time IN (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment IN (${env1:singlequote}, ${env2:singlequote}) GROUP BY environment)

WITH env1_objs AS (SELECT object_type, object_name, definition_hash, language, return_type, parameter_list FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote})), env2_objs AS (SELECT object_type, object_name, definition_hash, language, return_type, parameter_list FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote})) SELECT if(e1.object_type != '', e1.object_type, e2.object_type) as object_type, if(e1.object_name != '', e1.object_name, e2.object_name) as object_name, multiIf(e1.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Missing in ', ${env1:singlequote}), e2.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Missing in ', ${env2:singlequote}), e1.definition_hash != e2.definition_hash, '‚ö†Ô∏è Definition Changed', '‚úÖ Match') as status, e1.definition_hash as "${env1} Hash", e2.definition_hash as "${env2} Hash", if(e1.language != '', e1.language, e2.language) as language, if(e1.return_type != '', e1.return_type, e2.return_type) as return_type, if(e1.parameter_list != '', e1.parameter_list, e2.parameter_list) as parameters FROM env1_objs e1 FULL OUTER JOIN env2_objs e2 ON e1.object_type = e2.object_type AND e1.object_name = e2.object_name ORDER BY object_type, object_name

WITH env1_procs AS (SELECT object_name, definition_hash, language, return_type, parameter_list FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND object_type = 'PROCEDURE' AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote})), env2_procs AS (SELECT object_name, definition_hash, language, return_type, parameter_list FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND object_type = 'PROCEDURE' AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote})) SELECT if(e1.object_name != '', e1.object_name, e2.object_name) as procedure_name, multiIf(e1.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Only in ', ${env2:singlequote}), e2.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Only in ', ${env1:singlequote}), e1.definition_hash != e2.definition_hash, '‚ö†Ô∏è Definition Changed', '‚úÖ Match') as status, e1.language as "${env1} Language", e2.language as "${env2} Language", e1.return_type as "${env1} Return Type", e2.return_type as "${env2} Return Type", e1.parameter_list as "${env1} Parameters", e2.parameter_list as "${env2} Parameters", e1.definition_hash as "${env1} Hash", e2.definition_hash as "${env2} Hash" FROM env1_procs e1 FULL OUTER JOIN env2_procs e2 ON e1.object_name = e2.object_name ORDER BY procedure_name

WITH env1_views AS (SELECT object_name, definition_hash, is_materialized, columns FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND object_type = 'VIEW' AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote})), env2_views AS (SELECT object_name, definition_hash, is_materialized, columns FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND object_type = 'VIEW' AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote})) SELECT if(e1.object_name != '', e1.object_name, e2.object_name) as view_name, multiIf(e1.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Only in ', ${env2:singlequote}), e2.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Only in ', ${env1:singlequote}), e1.definition_hash != e2.definition_hash, '‚ö†Ô∏è Definition Changed', '‚úÖ Match') as status, if(e1.is_materialized, 'Yes', 'No') as "${env1} Materialized", if(e2.is_materialized, 'Yes', 'No') as "${env2} Materialized", e1.columns as "${env1} Columns", e2.columns as "${env2} Columns", e1.definition_hash as "${env1} Hash", e2.definition_hash as "${env2} Hash" FROM env1_views e1 FULL OUTER JOIN env2_views e2 ON e1.object_name = e2.object_name ORDER BY view_name

WITH env1_trigs AS (SELECT object_name, definition_hash, parent_table, event, timing FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND object_type = 'TRIGGER' AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote})), env2_trigs AS (SELECT object_name, definition_hash, parent_table, event, timing FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND object_type = 'TRIGGER' AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote})) SELECT if(e1.object_name != '', e1.object_name, e2.object_name) as trigger_name, multiIf(e1.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Only in ', ${env2:singlequote}), e2.object_name = '', concat('‚ùå Only in ', ${env1:singlequote}), e1.definition_hash != e2.definition_hash, '‚ö†Ô∏è Definition Changed', '‚úÖ Match') as status, e1.parent_table as "${env1} Table", e2.parent_table as "${env2} Table", e1.timing as "${env1} Timing", e2.timing as "${env2} Timing", e1.event as "${env1} Event", e2.event as "${env2} Event", e1.definition_hash as "${env1} Hash", e2.definition_hash as "${env2} Hash" FROM env1_trigs e1 FULL OUTER JOIN env2_trigs e2 ON e1.object_name = e2.object_name ORDER BY trigger_name

SELECT object_type, object_name, language, return_type, parameter_list as parameters, event, timing, definition_hash FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote}) ORDER BY object_type, object_name

SELECT object_type, object_name, language, return_type, parameter_list as parameters, event, timing, definition_hash FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote}) ORDER BY object_type, object_name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT application FROM "default"."schema_objects" ORDER BY application
list.label: Application
list.name: application
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT application FROM "default"."schema_objects" ORDER BY application

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
list.label: Environment 1
list.name: env1
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
list.label: Environment 2
list.name: env2
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_objects" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
